00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_SingleArgHook_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_SingleArgHook_hpp
00013 
00014 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00015 
00023 template <class T> class SingleArgHook {
00024     public:
00025         typedef void (*HookFn)(T);
00026 
00027         SingleArgHook() : m_hook(0) {}
00028         virtual ~SingleArgHook() { m_hook = 0; }
00029 
00031         BOOLEAN Add(HookFn fn) {
00032             if (m_hook == 0)
00033                 m_hook = fn;
00034 
00035             return (m_hook == fn);
00036         }
00037 
00039         BOOLEAN Remove(HookFn fn) {
00040             if (m_hook == fn)
00041                 fn = 0;
00042 
00043             return (fn == 0);
00044         }
00045 
00048         void Call(T t) {
00049             if (m_hook != 0)
00050                 m_hook(t);
00051         }
00052 
00053     private:
00054         HookFn m_hook;
00055 };
00056 
00058 #endif  // Apoxi_SingleArgHook_hpp
